      Subinterfaces of Role in org.nzdis.micro 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Group
      Role representing a Group.
      interface  PassiveRole
      Interface for PassiveRole.
      interface  SocialRole

      Classes in org.nzdis.micro that implement Role 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractRole
      Represents a base role.
      class  AnonymousRole
      AnonymousRole is a passive role implementation for compatibility with OPAL.
      class  DefaultCljSocialRole
      The DefaultCljSocialRole is a specialization of the DefaultSocialRole and assumes that message handling is done in Clojure.
      class  DefaultMessageFilter
      Default message filter implementation for micro-agent decomposition.
      class  DefaultPassiveRole
      Basis for Passive role implementation.
      class  DefaultSocialRole
      Basis for Social role implementation.
      class  MessageFilter
      The MessageFilter is a specialization of the social role provides the basis to define own message filters in order to allow effective decomposition of micro-agents by means of message filters.

    • Uses of Role in org.nzdis.micro.gip

      Classes in org.nzdis.micro.gip that implement Role 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GenericIntentProcessor
      The GenericIntentProcessor allows the execution of generic intents (annotated self- contained intents) by the platform without instantiating an additional agent.
